title: Vecchia
description: Vecchia is an authentic Italian Neapolitan pizzeria and mercato. The name — meaning **"old"** — reflects a devotion to traditional pizza-making: hand-made brick ovens imported directly from Italy, dough tossed fresh every morning. A philosophy that the old ways are still the best ways. The identity needed to embody that same conviction — timeless, handcrafted, unapologetic.
